00029 #ifndef _IP2ATM_H_
00030 #define _IP2ATM_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 
00034 class   ip2atm: public in1out {
00035 typedef in1out  baseclass;
00036 
00037 public:
00038         void    init(void);
00039         void    early(event *);
00040         rec_typ REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00041 
00042         void    start(void);
00043 
00044         int     b_len;          // burst length
00045         int     delta;          // cell spacing
00046 
00047         cell    *q_head;        // first element of the queue
00048         cell    *q_tail;        // last element
00049 
00050         int     send_cnt;       // number of cells already sent in the current burst
00051 };
00052 
00053 #endif  // _IP2ATM_H_
